00010 #ifndef _STACK_STRING_H___
00011 #define _STACK_STRING_H___
00012 
00013 #include <string>
00014 #include "stack_container.h"
00015 #include "noncopyable.h"
00016 
00018 
00020 
00023 template<size_t stack_capacity = 512, class TChar = char>
00024 class stack_string : public stack_string_container<
00025         std::basic_string<TChar, std::char_traits<TChar>, stack_allocator<TChar, stack_capacity> >,
00026         stack_capacity, stack_capacity - 1>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         typedef stack_allocator<TChar, stack_capacity> Allocator;
00030         typedef std::char_traits<TChar> CharTraits;
00031         typedef std::basic_string<TChar, CharTraits, Allocator> CharString;
00032         typedef stack_string_container<CharString, stack_capacity, stack_capacity - 1> StackStringContainer;
00033 
00035         stack_string()
00036                 : StackStringContainer()
00037         { }
00038 
00040         stack_string(const TChar* s)
00041                 : StackStringContainer()
00042         {
00043                 this->container().assign(s);
00044         }
00045 
00047         stack_string(const std::basic_string<TChar>& s)
00048                 : StackStringContainer()
00049         {
00050                 this->container().assign(s.c_str());
00051         }
00052 
00053 private:
00055         stack_string(const stack_string&);
00056         const stack_string& operator=(const stack_string&);
00057 };
00058 
00060 
00061 
00062 #endif // _STACK_STRING_H___
